articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Popularity of Harry and Meghan plummets in UK after Oprah interview, poll says - Reuters
articles.description: The popularity of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan has tumbled in Britain and has never been lower following their explosive interview with U.S. chat show host Oprah Winfrey, according to a poll on Friday.

articles.author: Charlie Milward
articles.title: Dermot O'Leary hits out at Piers Morgan in Meghan row 'You've got to take it seriously!' - Express
articles.description: DERMOT O'LEARY hit out at Piers Morgan on Friday's edition of This Morning as the host addressed the former Good Morning Britain star's controversial comments about Meghan Markle.
